data.name: Sample - SentinelOne - 3.4.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "SentinelOne" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Fetch Threats
workflows.description: List all threats identified by SentinelOne on agents.

workflows.name: Fetch Agents Logs
workflows.description: Fetches logs from agents system to the SentinelOne cloud.

workflows.name: Get Query Status
workflows.description: Get deep visibility query status, when state is FINISHED.

workflows.name: Custom API Endpoint
workflows.description: Allows querying a custom API endpoint in SentinelOne based on the endpoint and request you have specified.

workflows.name: SentinelOne > Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook demonstrate the list threats operation.

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Alert Pull Time

workflows.name: Get CVEs
workflows.description: Get known CVEs for applications. Available for complete SKU only.

workflows.name: Get Threat Timeline
workflows.description: Retrieve the threat's timeline details for a specified threat from SentinelOne.

workflows.name: Get Events
workflows.description: Get all deep visibility events from query.

workflows.name: Get Applications
workflows.description: List installed applications per endpoint, including risk level. Available for complete SKU only.

workflows.name: Abort Agent Scan
workflows.description: Aborts scanning on an agent system.

workflows.name: Get Hash Details
workflows.description: Retrieve the details for a specified hash.

workflows.name: Get Application CVEs
workflows.description: Get known CVEs for a specific application, along with app and endpoint information. Available for complete SKU only.

workflows.name: Export Threat
workflows.description: Export threat with its events as csv/json/raw.

workflows.name: Agent Action
workflows.description: Supports actions that can be performed on an agent.You must select Agent Action from the Action drop-down list and then select one of the following actions from the Action drop-down list in the Inputs section:Isolate Agent Network: Disconnects an agent from the network.Decommission Agent: Decommissions an agent.Uninstall Agent: Uninstalls agent software from the list of agents.Shutdown Agent: Shutdowns an agent's system.

workflows.name: Threat Forensic Details
workflows.description: Get detailed forensics data for the threat.

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Retrieves all alerts from SentinelOne based on the additional fields you have specified.

workflows.name: Add Note to a Threat
workflows.description: Add note to one or multiple threats in SentinelOne based on the threat ID and note that you have specified.

arguments.title: SentinelOne: Add Note to a Threat

routes.name: Start -> Add Note to a Threat

workflows.name: Get Threat Forensics
workflows.description: Get forensics data for the threat.

workflows.name: Free Text Filters
workflows.description: Returns a metadata list of the available free-text filters.

workflows.name: Get Agents
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of agents attached to an account.

workflows.name: Create Blacklist Item
workflows.description: Creates a Blacklist item in SentinelOne based on the os type, hash value, and other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Broadcast Message To Agent
workflows.description: Broadcast a message to a specified agent system or a list of agent systems.

params.message: Network issues expected in the next hour

workflows.name: Initiate Agent Scan
workflows.description: Initiates scanning on a specified agent system.

workflows.name: Get Agent Passphrase
workflows.description: Retrieves an agent's passphrase to uninstall an offline agent.

workflows.name: Reconnect Agent
workflows.description: Reconnects a disconnected agent to the network.

workflows.name: Export Applications Risk
workflows.description: Export installed applications and CVE list.

workflows.name: Mark Threat As Benign
workflows.description: Marks an identified threat as safe.

workflows.name: List All Threats
workflows.description: List all threats identified by SentinelOne on agents. You can additionally filter out the results by specifying the agent ID or the threat name.

workflows.name: > SentinelOne > Fetch Threats
workflows.description: Fetches all threats from SentinelOne based on the input parameters you have specified.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
{
    "title": "Pull Threats from Last X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Events_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Fetch threats from last X minutes. e.g 5",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 10
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration

workflows.name: Change Incident Status
workflows.description: Change Incident Status on SentinelOne based on the threat ID and incident status that you have specified.

workflows.name: Mitigate Threat
workflows.description: Mitigates identified threats in the system.

workflows.name: Get Threat Events List
workflows.description: List all threat events identified by SentinelOne on agents. You can additionally filter out the results by specifying the threat ID or other input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Create Query And Get Query ID
workflows.description: Start a deep visibility query and get the queryId.

steps.name: Create Query And Get Query ID

arguments.name: SentinelOne
arguments.operationTitle: Create Query And Get Query ID

arguments.title: SentinelOne: Create Query And Get Query ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Create Query And Get Query ID

workflows.name: Get Threat Seen on Network
workflows.description: Get seen on network data for the threat.

arguments.title: SentinelOne: Get Threat Seen on Network

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Threat Seen on Network

workflows.name: Get Application Count
workflows.description: Get number of applications by risk level or filters.

workflows.name: Get Agent Application
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of applications installed on an agent.

workflows.name: Fetch Threat File
workflows.description: Fetch a file associated with the threat that matches the filter.

workflows.name: Get Events By Type
workflows.description: Get deep visibility events from query by event type.

workflows.name: Get Agent Count
workflows.description: Retrieves the count of agents on a specified time, filtered by several parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Cancel Running Query
workflows.description: Stop deep visibility query by queryId.

workflows.name: Get Threat Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of a threat.
